job_tasks.phrase: craft the infrastructure, libraries and tooling to support data ingestion, processing, monitoring and lineage
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of data engineering, focusing on building and managing the systems for data handling.

job_tasks.phrase: Administer Kafka clusters that play a central role for data exchange in the company
job_tasks.justification: Managing Kafka clusters is a key component of data ingestion and processing pipelines, falling under data engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Set up and maintain third party tools in Kubernetes that are used for data visualization, discovery and lineage
job_tasks.justification: Setting up and maintaining tools within Kubernetes for data-related functions like lineage and visualization are aspects of data infrastructure management.

job_tasks.phrase: Monitoring in Prometheus and Grafana - you build and set up solutions that make sure our systems are operating smoothly
job_tasks.justification: Building and setting up monitoring solutions with tools like Prometheus and Grafana is a core MLOps/DevOps task for ensuring system operability.

job_tasks.phrase: Help improve our CI/CD framework for reliable builds and deployments
job_tasks.justification: Improving CI/CD frameworks directly relates to the operational aspects of deploying and managing systems, which is part of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Write tools and services in Go and Python
job_tasks.justification: Writing tools and services in programming languages is a fundamental software development task.

soft_skills.phrase: Diverse and internationally distributed team: joining our team means becoming part of a large, global community with people of more than 90 nationalities.

Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
Remote work, flexible hours: ... all in sync with your team's general locations and time zones to foster effective and seamless collaboration.

Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.

Monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on data engineering, MLOps, and traditional software development tasks. While it mentions data processing and lineage, there is no emphasis on building or fine-tuning generative AI models, making it unsuitable for a GenAI Engineer profile. It does not align with ML Engineer responsibilities either.
